title: Flustered: First Date

by artindistress

Bakugou and Midoriya are dating, but they haven’t gone on an official date yet. Well, that just won’t do…

title: Salamander
description:
by icarusisfalling

Midoriya Izuku is an expelled Magizoologist, best friend of war hero, Todoroki Shouto, The mom to 350 creatures he’s saved and nursed.

He also is in love with Katsuki Bakugou, Head Auror of the US and the strongest wizard there as well.

He’s so fucked.

Words: 838, Chapters: ¼, Language: English

Series: Part 5 of The Lives Of Broccoli and Dandelion

Probably just an art blog. Requests: open! (Just nothing too nsfw.) I’m just a sad rootbeer child, please show mercy upon my soul. | MINOR | Pansexual, uses he/him/she/her/they/them pronouns. (I don’t mind anything) I love vines and am absolutely open to people messaging me just to talk.

Fandoms I’m in:

Bnha/Mha (very active)

Danganronpa (very active)

summary: Witcher Dabi for ohmoka Fangirl Time  What's the best way to start a new sketch book? Riioght another BNHA Art xD Just couldn't...
body:
Witcher Dabi for ohmoka

Fangirl Time

What’s the best way to start a new sketch book? Riioght another BNHA Art xD

Just couldn’t help…I needed to draw Witcher-Dabi from @ohmoka AWESOME Fanfiction “The Winged Beast of Belhaven”. Check it out!!! It’s such an awesome witcher inspired fantasy AU and the writing is intense!!

I got Dabis outfit from a Witcher 3 Picture so at least I tried to get it like that x)

I messed up Dabis hair but this is still a sketch so it’s okay I guess.

Dabi of course belomgd to Kohei Horikoshi

Hope you’ll lile it ohmoka :3

Greets

Heru

Katsuki Bakugou / Izuku Midoriya fanfics on Ao3
Blog created April 2, 2019. No fics before this date will be archived.
This page is still under construction

title: Music Lovers - Literature lovers - Part 2
description:
by SmolBeanBoy

“This time I’m gonna tell you about that time when I met Kacchan’s parents over dinner and other things.
Sit back, grab some snacks and a drink and enjoy this story of how Kacchan totally made a fool of himself.”

“Hey I heard that nerd!”

Words: 5286, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

Series: Part 2 of Lovers
